name: ButtonBarTheme
desc: Applies a button bar theme to descendant [ButtonBar] widgets.

fields.name: data
fields.desc: The properties used for all descendant [ButtonBar] widgets.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of ButtonBarTheme
desc: You can specify the ButtonBarThemeData properties to set default styles for descendant ButtonBar components, such as alignment, style, margins, etc. You can also use ButtonBarTheme.of to get the theme properties of ButtonBar.
